text: Droopy Dog is a cartoon character created by Tex Avery for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer cartoon studio in 1943. It first appeared on a cartoon titled Dumb Hounded (1943). == Other media == The following lists are about the Droopy Dog media which were spin-offs and cameos of the series. === Television shows === * Tom and Jerry Kids (1990–1994) * Droopy, Master Detective (1993) * Tom and Jerry Tales (2006–2008) * The Tom and Jerry Show (2014-2021) * Tom and Jerry Singapore (2023-present) * Untitled Droopy animated series (TBA) === Theatrical movies === * Tom and Jerry: The Movie (1992) * Tom and Jerry (2021) === Direct-to-video films === * Tom and Jerry: The Magic Ring (2002) * Tom and Jerry Meet Sherlock Holmes (2010) * Tom and Jerry and the Wizard of Oz (2011) * Tom and Jerry: Robin Hood and his Merry Mouse (2012) * Tom and Jerry's Giant Adventure (2013) * Tom and Jerry: Spy Quest (2015) * Tom and Jerry: Back to Oz (2016) * Tom and Jerry: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (2017) * Droopy One and Only (2026) * Droopy Part 2 (2026) * Droopy, The Final Chapter (2026) Category:Anthromophic characters Category:Fictional dogs Category:Tom and Jerry
title: Droopy Dog
